The post includes two photos: one of a dead man in a body bag and another showing Pakistani cricket fans letting off flares in stands.
The Urdu caption of the post translates: Extreme of enmity. Because of beating by ungrateful Afghans, a Pakistani lost his life –- may Allah grant him a high place in paradise. Amen."
The image of cricket fans in the mislead: AP) photo of spectators at the June 29, 2019 cricket match between Pakistan and Afghanistan at Headingley.
